thread.title: Griffith out for rest of IU season with torn ACL
thread.title_full: Griffith out for rest of IU season with torn ACL

title: Griffith out for rest of IU season with torn ACL
text:
Griffith out for rest of IU season with torn ACL 
By Eric Dutkiewicz - 21Alive Indiana University wide receiver Isaac Griffith of Fort Wayne October 14, 2015 Updated Oct 14, 2015 at 1:10 PM EDT 
BLOOMINGTON, Ind. (21Alive) – Indiana wide receiver/kick returner Isaac Griffith will miss the rest of the season with a torn ACL. 
Griffith, a redshirt sophomore out of Homestead High School, injured his knee Saturday at Penn State. 
Digital Daily – subscribe to our daily newsletter 
“His knee gave way,” IU head coach Kevin Wilson says. “That's going to require surgery.” 
Griffith tallied 2 catches and 14 yards in the Hoosiers’ 29-7 loss in Happy Valley. He had one catch for 9 yards in a win over Western Kentucky on Sept. 19.
